name: 2D Shooter - Tutroial Version
description:
CAS 117 2D Shooter tutorial 

Don't know why but I couldn't download it as a WebGL file. It can be downloaded but can't find on the file tab. 

For my final version, I will modify the following elements. 

1. Modify Level 2 to make it harder (Adding multiple enemies)

2. Add Level 3 (Add different types of enemies)

3. Add Leve 4 (Add different types of enemies)

4. Add Instruction
